changeSet.sql: insert into sec.permission(name, code) select 'Доступ к справочникам', 'rdm' where not exists(select 1 from sec.permission where code = 'rdm'); insert into sec.permission(name, code, parent_code) select 'Добавление/редактирование справочников', 'rdm.edit', (select code from sec.permission where code = 'rdm') where not exists(select 1 from sec.permission where code = 'rdm.edit'); insert into sec.permission(name, code, parent_code) select 'Архивирование справочников', 'rdm.archive', (select code from sec.permission where code = 'rdm') where not exists(select 1 from sec.permission where code = 'rdm.archive'); insert into sec.permission(name, code) select 'Аудит', 'audit' where not exists(select 1 from sec.permission where code = 'audit');
